tools.name: Google
tools.description: Worker that searches results from Google. Useful when you need to find short answers about a specific topic.

tools.name: LLM
tools.description: A pretrained LLM like yourself. Useful when you need to act with general language model.

tools.name: CurrentWeather
tools.description: 获取某个城市的当前天气信息

tools.name: DailyWeatherForecast
tools.description: 获取某个城市未来几天的天气预报

tools.name: WeatherIndexForecast1D
tools.description: 提供某个城市未来一天的天气指数预报

tools.name: CurrentAirQualityIndex
tools.description: 获取某个城市的当前空气质量指数

tools.name: CityLookup
tools.description: 通过城市名称或其他信息搜索城市

tools.name: TopCityLookup
tools.description: 获取当前最热门的城市列表

tools.name: SunriseSunset
tools.description: 获取某个城市的日出和日落时间

tools.name: GetExchangeRates
tools.description: 获取不同货币之间的汇率信息

tools.name: GetLanguageCode
tools.description: 获取不同语言的语言码

tools.name: GetCurrencyCode
tools.description: 获取不同货币的货币码

tools.name: SearchHotels
tools.description: 搜索符合条件的酒店列表

tools.name: SearchFlights
tools.description: 搜索符合条件的航班信息
